name: Spidey Luv
description:
This is "Spidey Luv", a game I made in 5 days with Unity.

You control a spidey that needs to go upwards to kiss its lovely wifey spidey.

But be aware, this is a dangerous world.

Music by Trevor Lentz

CONTROLS

Left Click (Hold) : Throw Spider Web

Right Click (Hold) : Throw another Spider Web
